Uses of Class
com.sun.xacml.Target

Packages that use Target
com.sun.xacml This is the root package, which contains the PDP class where most people will want to start. 
 

Uses of Target in com.sun.xacml
 

Methods in com.sun.xacml that return Target
static Target Target.getInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node root, PolicyMetaData metaData)
          Creates a Target by parsing a node.
static Target Target.getInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node root, java.lang.String xpathVersion)
          Deprecated. As of 2.0 you should avoid using this method and should instead use the version that takes a PolicyMetaData instance. This method will only work for XACML 1.x policies.
 Target AbstractPolicy.getTarget()
          Returns the target for this policy
 Target PolicyTreeElement.getTarget()
          Returns the target for this element or null if there is no target
 Target Rule.getTarget()
          Returns the target for this Rule or null if there is no target
 Target PolicyReference.getTarget()
          Returns the target for this policy.
